snippet: The government will now prohibit the students from doing most warehouse, construction, manufacturing and food-processing work.
abstract: State Department issues new rules significantly revising the types of jobs foreign students can do under the Summer Work Travel Program, prohibiting them from most warehouse, construction and factory jobs; rules are issued in response to abuse complaints from several hundred foreign students working at a Hershey plant in Pennsylvania in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The government will now prohibit the students from doing most warehouse, construction, manufacturing and food-processing work.

headline.seo: U.S. to Revise Foreign Student Job Program
headline.main: State Department Revises Foreign Student Job Program After Abuse Complaints
headline.print_headline: State Department Revises Foreign Student Job Program After Abuse Complaints
